about-me.title: About me
about-me.second-text: I've been a <hightlight>software developer</hightlight> since 2018 and graduated from the <hightlight>University of Guadalajara</hightlight> with a degree in <hightlight>Computer Engineering</hightlight>
about-me.third-text: I have more than three years of work experience using <hightlight>React</hightlight>, <hightlight>Tailwind</hightlight>, <hightlight>Node.js</hightlight> and <hightlight>TypeScript</hightlight>
about-me.fourth-text: I also have experience using tools like <hightlight>Unity Engine</hightlight>, <hightlight>React Native</hightlight>, <hightlight>Git</hightlight>, <hightlight>MySQL</hightlight> and <hightlight>C#</hightlight>

my-projects.title: My projects
my-projects.hover-for-preview: Hover or press to watch a preview

x-ray-explorer-vr.description: VR application focused on the learning of the human skeleton in a interactive and fun way.

en-los-ojos-de-tlachi.description:
Puzzle and adventure videogame set in a isometric 2.5D world, in which you can play as a tlacuache that searches ways to avoid the challenges that their reality presents.

This game was submitted to a game jam organized by Latin America Games Showcase.

webp-converter.description:
Open source desktop multi-platform application that allows the user to convert images to WEBP and other formats such as JPG, PNG, TIFF and BMP.

At the moment has {{stars}} stars on GitHub!

proyectos-y-refrigeracion.description: Official landing page for Refrigeración y Proyectos S.A. de C.V.

medal-of-darkness.description: Puzzle videogame for teenagers in order to help and improve the reading comprehension and logic reasoning.
